width.description: Width of the photo in pixels.
width.title: Width

height.description: Height of the photo in pixels.
height.title: Height

url.description: URL of the photo page on Pexels.
url.title: Url

photographer.description: Name of the photographer who captured the photo.
photographer.title: Photographer

photographer_url.description: URL linking to the photographer's profile on Pexels.
photographer_url.title: Photographer_url

avg_color.description: Average color of the photo represented as a hex color code.
avg_color.title: Avg_color

src.description: Different sizes and formats of the photo source URLs.
src.title: Src

original.description: URL for the original size of the photo (highest resolution).
original.title: Original

large2x.description: URL for the 2x large-sized version of the photo (high resolution).
large2x.title: Large2x

large.description: URL for the large-sized version of the photo.
large.title: Large

medium.description: URL for the medium-sized version of the photo.
medium.title: Medium

small.description: URL for the small-sized version of the photo.
small.title: Small

portrait.description: URL for the portrait-oriented version of the photo.
portrait.title: Portrait

landscape.description: URL for the landscape-oriented version of the photo.
landscape.title: Landscape

tiny.description: URL for the tiny-sized version of the photo (thumbnail).
tiny.title: Tiny

liked.description: The number of users who have liked this photo.
liked.title: Liked

alt.description: Alternative text describing the content of the photo.
alt.title: Alt
